title: Senior iOS Engineer - Home Ecosystem (Apps & Frameworks)
summary: Posted: 18 Jun 2024 Weekly Hours: 40 Role Number:200556008
description: In this role, you will design and implement new software experiences in close partnership with SW, HW and other disciplines across Apple such as Design, Product Marketing, Privacy, Security, Machine Learning, HomePod and AppleTV. Your passion for technology, privacy, and user experiences will be key to success...
key_qualifications: Proficient in Swift and/or Objective-C and common Apple frameworks and technologies. Hands-on experience shipping high quality software with responsive, interactive UI. Experience creating powerful and concise APIs and broad knowledge of layered software architecture...
preferred_qualifications: Experience with performance – profiling, identifying, and implementing optimization strategies. Experience with memory debugging tools and strategies. Familiarity with Machine Learning and/or Computer Vision domains...
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location...
